eva abhāva niścaya aṅgam na anya mātrasya iti anupalabdhi vyavasthā nibandhanasya na kṣatiḥ
na ca vyavahāra mātra sādhanam atra api saṃmatam

original: ity āha sāpekṣā tu parā smṛtāv ata ihābhāvo'pi sādhyaḥ |
analyzed: iti āha sāpekṣā tu parā smṛtau atas iha abhāvaḥ api sādhyaḥ
tad siddhau ca

original: tanniścayasthitilakṣaṇo vyavahāro'pi na punas tanmātram ity arthaḥ | tathā
analyzed: tad niścaya sthiti lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ api na punar tanmātram iti arthaḥ tathā
hetu vyāpaka nihnava ibhāvaḥ api sādhyaḥ iti vartate
yathā na iha dhūma ugneḥ abhāvāt
na iha śiṃśapā vṛkṣa abhāvāt
na hi atra agni vṛkṣayoḥ pratiyogi pra
tyakṣa mātram pūrva pravṛtta tādātmya tad utpatti sambandha bodha smaraṇa nirapekṣam
dhūma āśiṃśapayoḥ abhāva niścayam prasavati
te etarhi niṣedha hetavaḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ
kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ca iti
tathā vidhi sādhanau dvau iti pañca hetavaḥ
prasaktāḥ na
anupalabdhi sāmānya āśrayāt
eka tvāt api ca anupalabdhiḥ svasya aparasya aparā
kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ

original: svabhāvānupalabdhir evāparasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vā'parā kāraṇānupalabdhir
analyzed: svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva aparasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vā aparā kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ
vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ca ucya ūte
yathā hi anya pratyakṣam eva anyasya anupalabdhiḥ
tathā kasyacid svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva

original: kāryavyāpyāpekṣayā kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhir ucyata iti na vyapadeśabhedād
analyzed: kārya vyāpya apekṣayā kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ucyate iti na vyapadeśa bhedāt
vastu bhedaḥ

original: tasmāt svabhāvānupalabdher eva niṣedhaḥ sarvasyeti trayam eva liṅgam |
analyzed: tasmāt svabhāva anupalabdheḥ eva niṣedhaḥ sarvasya iti trayam eva liṅgam
etena kāryasya svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva
samartha kāraṇasya kārya anupalabdhiḥ upalakṣitā draṣṭavyā
hetu śabdasya vā liṅga arthasya
vyākhyānāt yathā
na iha apratibaddha sāmarthayāni dhūma kāraṇāni santi dhūma abhāvāt iti
katham tarhi na atra tuṣāra sparśa ugneḥ iti
atra api anupalabdhiḥ svasya aparasya aparā

original: vyāpakasya hi śītasya viruddhadahanopalabdhirūpā yā svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ ,
analyzed: vyāpakasya hi śītasya viruddha dahana upalabdhi rūpā yā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ
sā vyāpyasya tuṣāra sparśasya
vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ ucyate iti na doṣaḥ
yadi api ca vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ
api sā vaktum śakyā tathā api
viruddha pratiyogi pratīti rūpa tā pratipādana artham tathā vyapadeśaḥ
evam kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhi ādayaḥ
vyākhyeyāḥ
sarvatra abhāve eva sādhya udhyakṣeṇa asiddheḥ
tad dvārakaḥ tu vyavahāraḥ iti
nanu viruddha upalabdhi ādau katham
anupalabdhi vyavahāraḥ uktam atra
pratiyogi upalabdhiḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ

original: pratiyogī ca dvividha eva | tatra yadā
analyzed: pratiyogī ca dvividhaḥ eva tatra yadā
viruddhaḥ pratiyogī
tadā viruddha śabda prayoga
upalabdhi śabdam evam prayojyam upapādayati
śeṣe tu pratiyogini gamyamāne
svabhāva śabdaḥ dṛśya śabdaḥ vā prayujyamānaḥ pratiṣedhya apekṣayā anupalabdhi śabdena
vyapadeśayati

original: tad ekatropalabdhitvaṃ gamyam anyatrānupalabdhitvam | tattvaṃ tv
analyzed: tat ekatra upalabdhi tvam gamyam anyatra anupalabdhi tvam tattvam tu
ekam eva iti na doṣaḥ

original: yadā ca viruddhaḥ pratiyogī dvitīyasya ca parokṣasyaiva
analyzed: yadā ca viruddhaḥ pratiyogī dvitīyasya ca parokṣasya eva
niṣedhaḥ tadā tasya api na avaśyam
pratyakṣam eva anupalabdhiḥ
kim tu anumānam api
viruddhaḥ hi sva sattayā para sattām apanayan
pratiyogī mataḥ

original: na ca parokṣo'pi tathābhavan kena vāryate ?
analyzed: na ca parokṣaḥ api tathā bhavan kena vāryate
niyata sahopalambhe tu pratiyogini pratyakṣa yogyasya eva
niṣedhaḥ iti tasya avaśyam pratyakṣa apekṣā

original: na hy anumīyamāne pradeśe ghaṭo yadi
analyzed: na hi anumīyamāne pradeśe ghaṭaḥ yadi
bhavet upalabhyeta eva iti sāmarthyam pratyakṣa ayogāt anumānasya
ca ārambha niyama abhāvāt iti katham niṣedhaḥ
yadi evam
vikalpa mātrāt apratiṣedhaḥ iti ced na
tatra api vikalpa ākāre vedyamāne bahis api
abhimata deśam iti ucyate
na tu vikalpanīye

original: bāhye vikalpyamāne dvitīyam api vedyeta iti śakyam |
analyzed: bāhye vikalpyamāne dvitīyam api vedyeta iti śakyam
vikalpanīya api bāhye vikalpyamāne tad deśam

original: aparam upalabhyetaiva iti kiṃ na syāt ?
analyzed: aparam upalabhyeta eva iti kim na syāt
na hi pratiyogi jñānam anyasya dṛśya tā āropa nibandhanam
api tu abhāva niścaya utpāda nimittam
sattva vastu tvāt
tat ca vikalpasya api iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ
atha pratipattṛ anurodhaḥ
eka jñāna saṃsargiṇā api anurodhaḥ sādhuḥ iti
na evam jale gandhasya anale
rasasya api śeṣa mātra upalabdhau vā abhāva vyavahāra mātra darśanāt tatra vā
jñāna akārya anupalambha vāde nyatra api saḥ evā iti kim eka jñāna saṃsargiṇā
kārya anupalabdhyā samarthasya eva niṣedhaḥ iti ced

original: gandhādis tarhi sann api nīrādāv indriyavaiguṇyān
analyzed: gandha ādiḥ tarhi san api nīra ādau indriya vaiguṇyān
na upalambhyaḥ iti mahat eva śāstra pariśrama phalam
sa hi vaiguṇyasya kāraṇa anupalambhe pi
yogi ādibhiḥ abhibhavam sambhāvayan saṃśete
bhū tale tu tad kṛta abhūta darśanam
indriya pāṭave api sambhāvayan kim na saṃśete
tasmāt abhyāsa daśāyām tādavasthya sthityā eva
vyavahāraḥ
nyāyanāthasya tu na vyavahāram anuvṛttya
paryanuyogaḥ visargaḥ vā
kim tu etāvatyām api
gatau na asmad lakṣaṇa kṣatiḥ iti darśayitum prauḍhi vaśāt
yathā sarva citta asarva bodha niścaye pi saḥ eva
sarvajñaḥ iti

original: vyavahāre ca yathaikajñānasaṃsargiṇaṃ paśyatas tathā'nyam api
analyzed: vyavahāre ca yathā eka jñāna saṃsargiṇam paśyataḥ tathā anyam api

original: pratiyoginam abhāvaniścayo dṛṣṭaḥ sādhāraṇo'visaṃvādī ceti naikajñānasaṃsargigrahaḥ |
analyzed: pratiyoginam abhāva niścayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ visaṃvādī ca iti na eka jñāna saṃsargi grahaḥ
vikalpa śaraṇa avasthāyām ca tad ākāra saṃvedanam eva anya niṣedha sādhanam yuktam
tathā eva abhyāsena pratyakṣa sāmarthya darśanāt
tat evam viruddhasya parokṣasya api upalabdhiḥ
anumāna ātmika abhāvam itarasya sādhayati

original: yathā neha śītaṃ dhūmād ity evaṃ
analyzed: yathā na iha śītam dhūmāt iti evam
vyāpaka viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ draṣṭavyā
yathā na iha tuṣāram dhūmāt
etat ca saṅkalayya
prayoga kāle vyākhyānam

original: vastutas tu na śītam agner ity ekaḥ prayogaḥ
analyzed: vastutas tu na śītam agneḥ iti ekaḥ prayogaḥ

original: tadasiddhiparihārāya tv asti cāgnir atra dhūmād ity aparaḥ |
analyzed: tad asiddhi parihārāya tu asti ca agniḥ atra dhūmāt iti aparaḥ
tathā na tuṣāram

original: agneḥ | vyāpakasya hi viruddho viruddha eva ,
analyzed: agneḥ vyāpakasya hi viruddhaḥ viruddhaḥ eva
agniḥ ca dhūmāt iti
śeṣam api evam ūhyam
yadi kāraṇa ādeḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ anyasya kāraṇa ādi anupalabdhiḥ
paryudāsa rūpā
katham tarhi nirupākhyeṣu
yathā na vaktā bandhyā sutaḥ caitanya abhāvāt
iti tatra api buddhi pratibhāsasya eva caitanya viyukta tvena saṃvedanam
vyāpaka anupalabdhi paryudāsaḥ
vaktṛ tva vyavacchedena ca saṃvedanam vyāpya abhāvaḥ
svabhāva hetu paryavasitāḥ ca sarva anupalabdhayaḥ

original: niṣedhasādhanādhyavasāyāc ca bhedena nirdeśa iti na doṣaḥ |
analyzed: niṣedha sādhana adhyavasāyāt ca bhedena nirdeśaḥ iti na doṣaḥ
tathā api uktena krameṇa sākṣāt eva

original: svabhāvanupalabdhir niṣedha iti katham ācāryapādaiḥ paramparayā'bhidhānād
analyzed: svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ niṣedhaḥ iti katham ācārya pādaiḥ paramparayā abhidhānāt
aupacārikaḥ kṛtaḥ iti ced
niṣedhyasya eva yadi dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ
niṣeddhrā vivakṣitā tad aupacārikaḥ
yadi tu parasya api

original: tadā mukhya iti ko virodha iti | kevalam
analyzed: tadā mukhyaḥ iti kaḥ virodhaḥ iti kevalam
aupacārika kathane kim prayojanam iti syāt
tatra api dṛśyasya eva niṣedhaḥ yathā
śakyaḥ syāt na anyasya
sarvajña vīta rāga ādeḥ pradhāna puruṣa arthasya iti kāryataḥ tatra antarbhāvaḥ
tattvataḥ tu tasya tad anyasya vā
yathā uktasya anupalabdhiḥ sādhikā iti anupalabdhi rahasyam samāptam
